channel.title: Need Help With Testscape Commands And Menus
channel.description:
Ok here basically what my situation is:
Base Server: cheezscape forum: *advertising is not allowed* me: darkbb what i need: a way to customize my server in a way that i can completely control what is happening and the server will not freak when i do something...
specifics: i need to change everything that says cheezscape into roidscape on like the main menus and everywhere that it says all that stuff...i was thinking this would be right next to the custom commands spot but i have looked and looked and i cant find custom commands or anything like them anywhere
SOMEONE THAT IS FAMILIAR WITH CHEEZSCAPE PLEASE HELP ME.
EDIT: also i need a better save game handler if anyone has a more reliable one.

item.title: Need Help With Testscape Commands And Menus
item.dc:creator: @RoidScape.Darkbb RoidScape.Darkbb
item.description:
@RoidScape.Darkbb wrote:

ok…for one i lied…i am using cheezscape…i tried it on cheezscape and it has done nothing…i need some more detailed information please

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Testscape Commands And Menus

item.title: Need Help With Testscape Commands And Menus
item.dc:creator: @_BOOM .:BOOM:.
item.description:
@_BOOM wrote:

Client.java > Ctrl+H then type TESTSCAPE > Replace all the TESTSCAPE words with ROIDSCAPE and then compile. (BASIC STUFF )

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Testscape Commands And Menus

item.title: Need Help With Testscape Commands And Menus
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

have you tried just searching up “Testscape” and just replacing it with roidscape?

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Testscape Commands And Menus
